item.description:
Shivani is teaching 5 new classes a week at Sacred Rivers Yoga open to all levels. This class is a vinyasa style that will challenge you to meet yourself at an edge with joy and compassion and encourage you to be authentically you!! Come as you are, all levels welcome!

For more info check out www.bodymindheart.org

Weekly Schedule:

-Mon 7:30-8:45pm
-Tues, Wed, Thurs 9:30-10:45am
-Sat 12-1:15pm
item.name: Power Flow Yoga at Sacred Rivers Yoga Center in Glastonbury
